column4: okay so i just reinstalled ubuntu to fix it. it worked i am in windows now. got the directions to get it to work after i uninstall ubuntu agian, however i cannot burn my xp cd because i only have dvd-r's not cd-r's i can easily solve this buy getting a blank cd-r and just waiting, but if not too much troble anybody got an solution either under xp or ubuntu(installed this time not live) without the xp cd? if not i'll just wait
